src:
Gulat Pra PON 2020 Digelar Sabtu, Begini Jadwalnya
01 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Tempo.co, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Gelaran gulat Pra PON 2020 mulai dipentaskan di GOR Otista, Jakarta Timur, Sabtu 2 November. Setelah prosesi pembukaan pukul 13.00 WIB, para pegulat di tiga kelas gaya grego putra dan satu kelas gaya bebas putri langsung bertarung, yakni kelas 60 kg, 77 kg dan 97 kg gaya grego putra dan kelas 50 kg gaya bebas putri. Pertarungan babak repechage hingga direncanakan mulai pukul 17.00 WIB.
Ketua Umum Pengurus Pusat Persatuan Gulat Seluruh Indonesia (PP PGSI), Trimedya Panjaitan, dipastikan hadir menyaksikan rangkaian laga final di empat kelas.
"Kami juga mengharapkan kehadiran Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta, Prasetyo Edi Marsudi," ungkap Steven Setiabudi Musa, ketua penpel Pra PON 2020 yang juga ketua pengprov PGSI DKI Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/) malam di GOR Jakarta Timur.
Steven Setiabudi Musa yang anggota Komisi B DPRD DKI Jakarta juga mengundang Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan. Namun, Anies yang di masa remaja juga pernah menggeluti olahraga gulat, belum memastikan kehadirannya.
Gulat Pra PON 2020 mempertandingkan 18 kelas dari tiga gaya, yakni enam kelas gaya bebas dan enam kelas gaya grego putra, serta enam kelas gaya bebas putri. Selama empat hari persaingan masing-masing ditarungkan empat kelas.
text:
Pre PON 2020 Wrestling Held Saturday, Here's the Schedule
01 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Tempo.co, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The pre-PON 2020 wrestling event will be held at the Otista Sports Hall, East Jakarta, Saturday, November 2. After the opening procession at 13.00 WIB, the wrestlers in three men's grego style classes and one women's freestyle class directly fought, namely 60 kg, 77 kg and 97 kg men's grego styles and 50 kg women's freestyle classes. The repechage round will be planned until 17.00 WIB.
The Chairperson of the Board of Management of the Indonesian Central Wrestling Association (PP PGSI), Trimedya Panjaitan, was certainly present to witness the final series of action in four classes.
"We also expect the presence of the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Prasetyo Edi Marsudi," said Steven Setiabudi Musa, chairman of the Pre PON 2020 Penpel who is also the Chairperson of the DKI Jakarta PGSI pengprov, Friday (11/1 /) night at GOR East Jakarta.
Steven Setiabudi Musa who is a member of Commission B of DKI Jakarta DPRD also invited DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan. However, Anies, who in adolescence also had wrestling, has not confirmed its presence.
Gulat Pra PON 2020 matches 18 classes from three styles, namely six freestyle classes and six men's grego style classes, and six women's freestyle classes. During the four days of competition each class put four classes.
